description: {"blocks":[{"key":"69vdc","text":"The production of LRRK1 protein and its variants was performed using bacculovirus expression system. The method includes three major steps cloning, large scale expression and protein purification. The high quality LRRK1 protein produced through this method has been used for further biochemical and biophysical studies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7aqeq","text":"After vigorous washing (20-30 CV) with lysis buffer, the His6-Z tagged protein was eluted in lysis buffer containing imidazole (50 mM HEPES   500 mM NaCl, 300 mM imidazole, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol). {"blocks":[{"key":"6a407","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejbgl","text":"The eluate was diluted with buffer containing no NaCl, (20 mM HEPES   0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol) in order to reduce the NaCl-concentration to 250 mM ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1i508","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2B99DF70E55811EC982EAFB5298ADB4E","id":0,"number":"7.4"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5vpns","text":"His6 Z TEV-LRRK1 was eluted with a 250 mM to 2.5 M NaCl gradient. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqjai","text":"The protein was treated with TEV protease (molar ratio TEV to substrate about 1:50) overnight to cleave the His6 Z tag. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqt2t","text":"Contaminating proteins, the cleaved tag, uncleaved protein and TEV protease were removed by another combined SP-Sepharose Ni NTA step. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"765vd","text":"LRRK1 was concentrated and subjected to gel filtration in storage buffer (20 mM HEPES  , 150 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM TCEP, 0.5% glycerol) using an AKTA Pure system combined with an S200 gel filtration column. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evtn7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"42E68890E55811EC982EAFB5298ADB4E","id":0,"number":"7.4"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ko65","text":"The final yield as calculated from UV absorbance was 0.1 mg/L.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hfje","text":"The diluted protein was loaded onto an 5 mL SP-Sepharose column (Cytiva #17505701) connected to an ÄKTA Basic system. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqmjv","text":"Wash with buffer containing 250 mM NaCl (20 mM HEPES  , 250 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol) until the absorbance of the flowthrough is below 5 mAU","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"77thn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3A70DA80E55811EC982EAFB5298ADB4E","id":0,"number":"7.4"}}}}
